meanings.definition: The quality or state of being repetitious.
meanings.sent1: Her speech had a noticeable repetitiousnesses, with the same points being made over and over.
meanings.sent2: The repetitiousnesses of the song's chorus made it catchy and easy to remember.
meanings.sent3: The repetitiousnesses of the clock's ticking became almost comical as the meeting dragged on.
meanings.sent4: The repetitiousnesses of the waves crashing against the shore lulled her into a peaceful sleep.
meanings.sent5: The repetitiousnesses of his jokes made the audience groan in unison.

meanings.definition: The act of repeating something excessively.
meanings.sent1: His constant repetitiousnesses of the same stories annoyed his friends.
meanings.sent2: The repetitiousnesses of the advertisement made it hard to forget the product.
meanings.sent3: The repetitiousnesses of the dog's barking made the neighbors laugh every morning.
meanings.sent4: The repetitiousnesses of the dripping faucet echoed through the empty house.
meanings.sent5: The repetitiousnesses of her excuses wore thin on her boss.
